topic.title: HP Helion Development Platform Installation Prerequisites

section.title: Prerequisites
section.p: The HP Helion Development Platform is installed in the overcloud of HP Helion OpenStack
section.note: Helion OpenStack version 1.1.1 is required for Helion Development Platform 1.3. Installing Helion Development Platform on previous versions of Helion OpenStack is not supported. If you currently have a version of the Helion Development Platform installed on Helion OpenStack version 1.1, follow the upgrade procedures.

li.p: The Cinder block storage service must be configured with either VSA or 3Par.
If you installed HP Helion OpenStack with KVM hypervisor support, configure HP StoreVirtual VSA for Block Storage or configure HP 3PAR StoreServ Storage.

The system running the installer needs to have Python 2.7. Most modern operating systems include this as part of their base toolkit. This document is geared toward a Linux operating system but this does not preclude the installer from running on other operating systems with some minor modifications to the command-line statements.
